name: Intercept (Perfect Run)
description:
Defend the Earth from a huge battleship in this endless bullet-hell shooter!

CALCULATING, RUTHLESS ENEMY!
The enemy will determine the rate of effectiveness for each of its weapons, and focus its power on the ones that are the most effective against you. With its vast arsenal of firepower, eventually it will find a way to take you down!

CHOOSE WISELY!
After each round you will get to choose one of five powerups, to upgrade speed, health, or one of your three weapons. Choose wisely however, as while you get stronger for each round, so does your enemy. Choosing the right powerup is crucial if you want to last a few more rounds!

CONTROLS
Arrow keys  - Move
Z  - Shoot
X and C  - Change weapons
P  - Pause / Unpause
Spacebar/Enter - Select menu option
Esc  - Go back / Exit game

If you want to play with a joystick / gamepad, we recommend using JoyToKey: https://joytokey.net/en/

Graphics - Thomas McCloskey (@Gypopothomas)
Coding - Bisse (@SveTob)
Music - HOi
